name: Jinyuan Stella Sun
content: Dr. Jinyuan Stella Sun, EECS Contact: 604 Min Kao 1520 Middle Drive Knoxville, TN 37996 T: 865-974-0426 F: 865-974-4404 jysun@utk.edu Jinyuan Stella Sun å­ææº Associate Professor Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science College of Engineering University of Tennessee I am looking for self-motivated PhD students who are strongly committed. The successful candidates are expected to conduct research in network and system security, wireless communications and networking, and mobile computing. Please send me your CV, transcripts, TOEFL and GRE scores, and publications for consideration.
